1.name: Modern Laptop
1.description: A high-performance laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a stunning 4K display. Ideal for coding and design work.

2.name: Espresso Machine
2.description: Professional-grade espresso machine with a built-in grinder and steam wand. Brews perfect shots every time.

3.name: Organic Cotton Tee
3.description: Soft, breathable t-shirt made from 100% certified organic cotton. Available in multiple colors and sizes.
3.specs: 180 gsm fabric, Crew Neck, Eco-friendly dye

4.name: Wireless Headphones
4.description: Industry-leading noise cancellation headphones with a 30-hour battery life. Perfect for travel and focus.
4.specs: Bluetooth 5.0, Active Noise Cancelling, USB-C Charging

5.name: High-Power Blender
5.description: A kitchen essential with a powerful motor, ideal for smoothies, soups, and crushing ice in seconds.

6.name: Professional Notebook
6.description: A sleek A5 notebook with lined pages and a durable hard cover. Perfect for notes, journaling, or lab reports!

7.name: Smart Home Hub
7.description: Central control unit for all smart devices in your home. Compatible with all major voice assistants and protocols.

8.name: Portable Power Bank
8.description: Ultra-slim, high-capacity power bank to charge your phone and tablet multiple times. Features fast-charging technology.

9.name: Waterproof Backpack
9.description: Durable and completely waterproof backpack with a roll-top design and padded laptop sleeve. Ideal for commuting and hiking.

10.name: Digital Drawing Tablet
10.description: Pressure-sensitive tablet with a large active area and battery-free stylus. Essential tool for digital artists and illustrators.
10.specs: 10x6 inch Active Area, 8192 Pressure Levels, USB-C
